Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'This... Did you join the event from Astrology Club today, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Sigh. Are they still using this old design for their box?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hehe, bingo! But all I really did was make some changes to their design.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "You seem to know my style quite well, Commandant. You studied my work, didn't you? Now, shall we open it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla opens the package to find a small kaleidoscope inside. She plays with it for a while before handing it to you.'}
{3: 'You squint and look inside the kaleidoscope. The many astrology signs in there turn and combine into simple geometric shapes, spinning and reforming.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hmm... Your eyes... Symmetry... Collage... Got it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Don't move, Commandant. A new piece of phenomenal artwork is about to be born!", 4: '1'}
